1.text: Whisk together the dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl.

2.text: Mix together the wet ingredients in a separate mixing bowl.

3.text: Combine the wet and dry ingredients in the larger mixing bowl.

4.text: Add coconut, nuts, and zest and let the batter rest for 10 minutes.

5.text: Grease a large nonstick skillet over medium heat.

6.text: Scoop up 2 tablespoons (28.6 g) of batter and spread it in the skillet.

7.text: Cook the first side for about 3 minutes until the bottom is golden brown.

8.text: Use a spatula to flip the pancake and cook it for another 2 minutes.

9.text: Transfer the first pancake to a plate and repeat with the remaining batter.

10.text: Serve the pancakes warm with your choice of tasty toppings.

11.text: Store leftovers in the fridge or freezer to enjoy another day.

12.text: Put all of the ingredients into your blender.

13.text: Blend the ingredients together until the batter is smooth.

14.text: Grease a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat.

15.text: Drop 2-3 tablespoons (28.6-42.4 g) of batter into the frying pan.

16.text: Cook the first side for 3 minutes until the bottom is deep golden-brown.

17.text: Flip the pancake with a spatula and cook the other side for 2 minutes.

18.text: Put the pancake on a plate and make the rest of your pancakes.

19.text: Serve the pancakes warm with your favorite keto-friendly toppings.
